categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Mirisa  was a female Human quartermaster of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. Around 3640 BBY she was stationed in Fort Kodentha on Voss, where she distributed stimulants.
Quartermaster Mirisa appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Stims vendor on Voss.
